const pizzaPlace = "Nate's Pizza";
let pizzaToppings = 5; //"let" because I may change this.

console.log(pizzaPlace);
console.log(typeof pizzaPlace);
console.log(pizzaToppings);
console.log(typeof pizzaToppings);

console.log("At " + pizzaPlace + " we have " + pizzaToppings + " toppings.");
if (pizzaToppings < 10) {
  console.log("Quality, not quantity.");
} else if (pizzaToppings >= 10) {
  console.log("A whole lot of pizza.");
}

for (let i = 0; i <= 10; i++) {
  if (i % 2 == 0) {
    console.log(i);
  }
}
